properties.title: SUNLIT
properties.description: Development of new global tropospheric ozone datasets using combination of total ozone column from OMI and TROPOMI with stratospheric ozone column dataset from several available limb-viewing instruments (MLS, OSIRIS, MIPAS, SCIAMACHY, OMPS-LP, GOMOS). The novelty of the SUNLIT approach is using measurements from several satellite instruments in limb-viewing geometry for deriving the stratospheric ozone column dataset.
properties.osc:name: SUNLIT - Synergy of Using Nadir and Limb Instruments for Tropospheric ozone monitoring
